title: Season 2015
body:
Lets try something, I would like to know 4 things:

Your Rank at the end of Season 4.
Your Rank at the end of Preseason.
Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements. e.g. 5-5 W-L-L-W-W-L-L-L-W-W
The Rank you got placed in.

For Science {{champion:74}} +1 so we can get more DATA

replies.body:
(reserved for future purposes)
**Your Rank at the end of Season 4.**
G5
**Your Rank at the end of Preseason.
**G5
**Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements. e.g. 5-5 W-L-L-W-W-L-L-L-W-W**
5-5

WWWWWLLLLL
**The Rank you got placed in.**
G5

So many 5's...

> [{quoted}](name=Dota2forthewin,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NW2dE2AR,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-21T08:46:49.745+0000)

> **Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements. e.g. 5-5 W-L-L-W-W-L-L-L-W-W**
> 5-5
> 
> WWWWWLLLLL
> **The Rank you got placed in.**
> G5
> 
> So many 5's...

updated mine

end of season 4 silver 1
preseason silver 3

8 wins 2 losses

1.Win 12/2/9
2.Win 14/11/8
3.Loss 16/9/16 (couldn't carry team)
4.Win 12/3/8
5.Win 11/6/8 (golds started showing up in games)
6.Win 10/5/17 (opposing team plat adc)
7.win 9/1/10 
8.Win 7/6/7
9.Loss 6/9/10
10.Win 4/2/4

back to silver 4.....

**Your Rank at the end of Season 4.**
B1
**Your Rank at the end of Preseason.
**S2
**Your W/L record **
L/W/W/W/W/W/W/L/L/W
**The Rank you got placed in.**
Silver 3

Was expecting to be placed higher... 7 wins...{{champion:6}} to be kidding me
You went UP? Thats the first i've seen of someone getting placed higher than before.

Your Rank at the end of Season 4.
Silver 4
Your Rank at the end of Preseason.
Silver 3
Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements
8/10 - WWWWWWLLWW
The Rank you got placed in.
Bronze 1

Pretty pissed off about being put back into bronze after I won 8-10 placements matches.
Bronze 1 aint that bad. Just look at others in this thread LOL

Your Rank at the end of Season 4: Silver 5 
Your Rank at the end of Preseason: silver 5 was 2 games into my promos to silver 
Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements: 6-4 L-L-L-W-W-W-W-L-W-W
The Rank you got placed in: Bronze 3, wtf

**Your Rank at the end of Season 4.**
Gold Division V
**Your Rank at the end of Preseason.**
Gold IV
**Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements**
2/8
**The Rank you got placed in.**
Bronze I

Information from A Streamer: http://www.twitch.tv/lilqtcheese

Summoner: lQdChEeSe507
Season 4: Challenger
End of Preseason: Challenger
W/L: 8-2 W-L-L-W-W-W-W-W-W-W
Current Rank: Plat 1

Your Rank at the end of Season 4.
B One i believe
Your Rank at the end of Preseason.
Silver Five
Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements. e.g. 5-5 W-L-L-W-W-L-L-L-W-W
W-W-W-L-W-L-W-W-L-W
Placed B 4
Sounds harsh. 7-3 in placements and drop 3 divisions.

**Your Rank at the end of Season 4.**
Silver 5
**Your Rank at the end of Preseason.**
Gold 2
**Your W/L record (and order if possible) in your placements. e.g. 5-5 W-L-L-W-W-L-L-L-W-W**
6-4 W-W-W-L-L-L-W-W-W-L
**The Rank you got placed in.**
Gold 3

I was Plat 2 or 3 at the end of season 4,  diamond V at the end of pre season,
I won 6, lost 4:
L - W - W - W - L - W - W - L - L - W

*PLAT ONE BABY!*

I'll do this once i've placed, but can i add on something to write down, i'm just curious:

Which pick do people prefer, 1st, 2-3, 4-5, 6-7, 8-9 or 10....
I really hate being an early pick >

> [{quoted}](name=Breawien,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NW2dE2AR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-21T03:56:31.213+0000)
>
> I'll do this once i've placed, but can i add on something to write down, i'm just curious:
> 
> Which pick do people prefer, 1st, 2-3, 4-5, 6-7, 8-9 or 10....
> I really hate being an early pick >

I like being 3 or more. That way, I can get support and surprise the person on last pick, without doing the bans.
